EmailTemplate.name: 06-03-22 DBNK Innovation Conference Save the Date.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date: NCR Innovation Conference Nov. 1-4
EmailTemplate.textOnly: We're thrilled to announce that NCR Innovation Conference will be live and in-person this fall in Atlanta, GA, from November 1-4. Please join us for four fast-paced days designed to empower you with actionable insights, ignite your innovation efforts and help you differentiate with digital. You'll hear from renowned industry experts and business leaders on the latest in platform flexibility, account opening, financial wellness, business banking, payments, data, personalization, marketing and more. And you'll be sure to walk away inspired and empowered. Sign up now <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/ncr-innovation-conference?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=&utm_content=Email&utm_industry=banking&utm_sub-industry=Digital_Banking]]> to stay in the loop on the latest conference news. We hope to see you there! <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> Â© 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
